title: Client Crashes after Champ Select
body: Not sure what's going on, but everytime I've tried to load into a game after champ select it just goes to a black screen with the league logo, and then nothing. After I click around a bit it will tell me that the client is not responding and will close down. What doesnt make the most sense is that I was just able to play a 1forall game earlier this weekend, but since yesterday have had no luck. This even happens now when i try to put just myself into a custom made game. Any suggestions???

replies.body:
These symptoms typically pop up if your connection to the gameservers is *pretty poor*. Following our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) would be a great next step since it commonly resolves these sorts of issues and shouldn't take long to get through.

Let me know if those steps resolved this issue or not.

This isn't a connection error. The client proceeds to repair itself after the crash which I am pretty sure is not because of Internet.

Your team needs to start looking at this as a potential problem with the client, stop assuming everything is just a connection problem. It is disgraceful to treat us like this.

I'm getting the same thing man. Champs get selected and then client closes out to load the game, see league of legends logo then BAM, game closes out and bugsplat asks for a report.

I've tried disabling firewall and anti virus and also allowing permissions through them. I changed the compatibility mode to Windows 7 and Vista and also tried running as admin. I flushed the DNS and did a few other things and made sure all my software is up to date and nada. Only thing I haven't tried doing is reinstalling so I can run the old client. I tried to run the beta client to help em out but I didn't expect it to stop me from playing completely. Hopefully reinstalling fixes it.

EDIT: Running the game as the legacy client didn't fix it either. Fuck this game, I've already spent too much time trying to fix a game just for assholes to abuse me once I get into a game anyway.

Me too. Tired of this. Plus, it makes me wait longer every time I try to fix it and start up again cuz they say I went afk.
I even uninstalled and then reinstalled.
wtf?
